events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the Software Engineer position early this morning, including a detailed resume and cover letter highlighting their relevant experience and skills.
The application was reviewed and categorized under Engineering based on job title keywords such as 'software developer' and 'backend engineer'. All documents appeared complete and relevant.
A specialized recruiter for technical roles was assigned to manage this candidate's progress through the hiring process, facilitating the next steps efficiently.

The recruiter conducted a phone screening with the candidate to assess technical skills, communication abilities, and cultural fit, reporting an overall positive impression and strong alignment with the role.
The candidate responded promptly with enthusiasm to the screening feedback and confirmed their availability for a technical interview to discuss their background in more detail.
The technical interview was scheduled for the following week with the engineering team to evaluate the candidate's problem-solving abilities and coding proficiency.
